table.name: vtiger_contactrole
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_contactrole` ( `contactroleid` int(19) NOT NULL, `contactrolename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `contactroleno` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `contact` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `account` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `roletype` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`contactroleid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_contactrolecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_contactrolecf` ( `contactroleid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`contactroleid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
